thread.title: Marlene
thread.title_full: Enterprise Training School, Inc. reviewed by Marlene

author: Marlene
title: Marlene
text: The Identity Theft webinar I took on 1/19 presented a very interesting topic. I had taken this course 2 years ago and was gratified to know that course materials had kept pace with the "advances" in identity theft (new scams, new tools, etc) during that time period.
